<p> Billboard is a Grouping node that can contain most nodes. Contained D geometry faces the user, rotating about the specified axis. Set axisOfRotation=0 0 0 to fully face the user's camera. </p> <p> X3D Tooltips of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/tooltips/X3dTooltips.html#Billboard" target="_blank">Billboard</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/Architecture.html" target="_blank">X3D Specification</a> sections of interest: <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html" target="_blank">23 Navigation component</a>, <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Concepts" target="_blank">23.3 Concepts</a> and <a href="https://www.web3d.org/documents/specifications/19775-1/V3.3/Part01/components/navigation.html#Billboard" target="_blank">23.4.1 Billboard</a>. </p> <p> <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/X3dResources.html#Examples" target="_blank">X3D Examples Archives</a> of related interest: </p> <ul> <li> VRML 2 Sourcebook:&nbsp; <a href="https://www.web3d.org/x3d/content/examples/Vrml2Sourcebook/Chapter11Grouping" target="_blank">Chapter 11 Grouping</a> </li> <li> X3D for Web Authors: <a href="http://x3dgraphics.com/examples/X3dForWebAuthors/Chapter04ViewingNavigation" target="_blank">Chapter 04 Viewing Navigation</a> </li> </ul>
